trans-unit.source: Auriok Glaivemaster
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克扫刀手

trans-unit.resname: DST·1 | Auriok Glaivemaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME佩带武具，它得+1/+1并具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: "Give me a bit of steel and I'll deliver it into the hearts of my enemies."
trans-unit.target: 「只要给我一些钢铁，我就能把它给送进敌人的心脏里。」

trans-unit.source: Echoing Calm
trans-unit.target: 定静回响

trans-unit.resname: DST·2 | Echoing Calm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target enchantment and all other enchantments with the same name as that enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界及所有与其同名的其它结界。

trans-unit.source: A single light unleashes a hail of cleansing.
trans-unit.target: 引发净化风暴的一道明光。

trans-unit.resname: DST·3 | Emissary of Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Emissary of Hope
trans-unit.target: 希望密使

trans-unit.resname: DST·3 | Emissary of Hope | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you gain 1 life for each artifact that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手每操控一个神器，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Hallow
trans-unit.target: 崇圣

trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage target spell would deal this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
trans-unit.target: 防止目标咒语于本回合中将造成的所有伤害。 你获得与以此法所防止的伤害等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "Bend with the storm, then reply in kind."
trans-unit.target: 「顺应风暴，并以慈心回报。」

trans-unit.source: Leonin Battlemage
trans-unit.target: 狮族战法术师

trans-unit.resname: DST·5 | Leonin Battlemage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.\nWhenever you play a spell, you may untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。 每当你使用咒语时，你可以重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: The strongest of the pride are measured not by the steel in their hands but by the steel in their souls.
trans-unit.target: 狮群中的强者是以坚毅的心灵来认定，而非以高强的武艺来论断。

trans-unit.source: Leonin Shikari
trans-unit.target: 狮族猎户

trans-unit.resname: DST·6 | Leonin Shikari | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may play equip abilities any time you could play an instant.
trans-unit.target: 你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下来使用佩带异能。

trans-unit.source: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.
trans-unit.target: 她的直觉锐利如刃。

trans-unit.source: Loxodon Mystic
trans-unit.target: 象族秘教徒

trans-unit.resname: DST·7 | Loxodon Mystic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: As the nim storm across the plains, a lone priest stands in their path. At his silent gesture, the battle line breaks, and the tide turns.
trans-unit.target: 泞族自平原彼端蜂拥而来时，一名僧侣独身立于阵前。 他安静地摆出几个手势，战线因之断裂开来，逆转了战局。

trans-unit.source: Metal Fatigue
trans-unit.target: 金属疲劳

trans-unit.resname: DST·8 | Metal Fatigue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap all artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 横置所有神器。

trans-unit.source: The Auriok have fought the metal hordes for so long now that knowing how to cripple them has become an instinct.
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克人与金属大军争战已久，放倒它们的方法已经从知识变成了本能。

trans-unit.source: Pristine Angel
trans-unit.target: 纯净天使

trans-unit.resname: DST·9 | Pristine Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAs long as CARDNAME is untapped, it has protection from artifacts and from all colors.\nWhenever you play a spell, you may untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要CARDNAME并未横置，它便具有反神器保护与反五色保护。 每当你使用咒语时，你可以重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Pteron Ghost
trans-unit.target: 翼兽魂魅

trans-unit.resname: DST·10 | Pteron Ghost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Regenerate target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 牺牲CARDNAME：重生目标神器。

trans-unit.source: Defending to the death isn't always enough.
trans-unit.target: 有时候，光是舍命护卫还不够。

trans-unit.resname: DST·11 | Pulse of the Fields | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pulse of the Fields
trans-unit.target: 原野的脉动

trans-unit.resname: DST·11 | Pulse of the Fields | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 4 life. Then if an opponent has more life than you, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 你获得4点生命。 然后若任一对手的生命比你多，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: DST·11 | Pulse of the Fields | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Before religion or civilization, there was order.
trans-unit.target: 在宗教或文明现世之前，便有了秩序。

trans-unit.source: Purge
trans-unit.target: 涤净

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact creature or black creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器生物或黑色生物。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.source: For the first and last time, the horrific creature experienced terror.
trans-unit.target: 此邪物第一次，也是最后一次遭惊骇浪潮淹没。

trans-unit.resname: DST·13 | Ritual of Restoration | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ritual of Restoration
trans-unit.target: 修复祭仪

trans-unit.resname: DST·13 | Ritual of Restoration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: DST·13 | Ritual of Restoration | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Leonin raising ceremonies take place at the white sun's dawn, the rebirth of artifacts mirroring the birth of a new day.
trans-unit.target: 狮族在白太阳升起时举行祭仪，让再生的神器呼应全新一日的诞生。

trans-unit.source: Soulscour
trans-unit.target: 一扫生灵

trans-unit.source: Destroy all nonartifact permanents.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有非神器的永久物。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen the end of times, a future in which all our kind are torn from this world."\n—Ushanti, leonin shaman
trans-unit.target: 「我预见了末世景象：吾族尽自世间消逝。」 ～狮族先知乌珊提

trans-unit.source: Steelshaper Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 塑铁军学徒

trans-unit.resname: DST·15 | Steelshaper Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}, Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上：从你的牌库中搜寻一张武具牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Theirs is a craft brought about by necessity, now raised to the level of art.
trans-unit.target: 此技艺原系因应需求而诞生，而现今已臻艺术境界。

trans-unit.resname: DST·16 | Stir the Pride | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stir the Pride
trans-unit.target: 激励士气

trans-unit.resname: DST·16 | Stir the Pride | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn; or until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life."\nEntwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～由你操控的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束；或直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得「每当此生物造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。」 打包{1}{W}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）

trans-unit.resname: DST·17 | Test of Faith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Test of Faith
trans-unit.target: 试炼信念

trans-unit.resname: DST·17 | Test of Faith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
trans-unit.target: 防止本回合中接下来将对目标生物造成的3点伤害，且每以此法防止1点伤害，就在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: DST·17 | Test of Faith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.
trans-unit.target: 通过试炼者，身上会带着足资辨识的记号。

trans-unit.resname: DST·18 | Turn the Tables | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Turn the Tables
trans-unit.target: 扭转局面

trans-unit.resname: DST·18 | Turn the Tables | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn is dealt to target attacking creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，所有将对你造成的战斗伤害改为对目标进行攻击的生物造成之。

trans-unit.resname: DST·18 | Turn the Tables | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your arrogance is my best weapon."
trans-unit.target: 「你的骄妄是我最佳的武器。」

trans-unit.source: Carry Away
trans-unit.target: 夺走

trans-unit.resname: DST·19 | Carry Away | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, unattach enchanted Equipment.\nYou control enchanted Equipment.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将受此结界的武具卸装。 你操控受此结界的武具。

trans-unit.source: Stealing goblin weapons would be easier if the goblins were smart enough to let go.
trans-unit.target: 如果精灵聪明到晓得该把手上的东西丢掉，要偷他们的武器会更容易些。

trans-unit.source: Chromescale Drake
trans-unit.target: 铬鳞龙兽

trans-unit.resname: DST·20 | Chromescale Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all artifact cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用） 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，展示你牌库顶的三张牌。 将所有以此法展示的神器牌置于你的手上，并将其它的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Echoing Truth
trans-unit.target: 真相回响

trans-unit.resname: DST·21 | Echoing Truth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地的永久物及所有与其同名的其它永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.
trans-unit.target: 导致信任崩溃的一句谎言。

trans-unit.source: Hoverguard Observer
trans-unit.target: 情资空卫

trans-unit.resname: DST·22 | Hoverguard Observer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME只能阻挡具有飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: It could be made to run silently, but its low hum reminds the Neurok that they are always watched.
trans-unit.target: 它原本可以安静无声地运作，其低沉运转声是为了提醒纽若克人：他们一直处于监视之中。

trans-unit.source: Last Word
trans-unit.target: 定论

trans-unit.resname: DST·23 | Last Word | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities.\nCounter target spell.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被咒语或异能反击。 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Someday, someone will best me. But it won't be today, and it won't be you."
trans-unit.target: 「总有一天，有人会赢过我。 但那不会是今天，那人也不会是你。」

trans-unit.source: Machinate
trans-unit.target: 图谋

trans-unit.source: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶上的X张牌，X为由你操控的神器数量。 将其中一张牌置于你的手上，并将其它的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: As long as there are questions to be asked, the vedalken will ask them.
trans-unit.target: 只要有值得一问的问题，维多肯族都会提出来。

trans-unit.source: Magnetic Flux
trans-unit.target: 磁极变异

trans-unit.resname: DST·25 | Magnetic Flux | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Artifact creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的神器生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: After the researcher's astonishing success, his assistants spent six hours finding a way to return the specimens safely to the ground.
trans-unit.target: 在研究者达成此惊人突破后，助手花了六小时来找出让升空者平安落地的方法。

trans-unit.source: Neurok Prodigy
trans-unit.target: 纽若克逸才

trans-unit.resname: DST·26 | Neurok Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nDiscard an artifact card from your hand: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 从你的手上弃掉一张神器牌：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: "Why should I be bound by rules when I can see so far beyond them?"
trans-unit.target: 「若我已看穿了规则的局限，又何必要受其束缚？」

trans-unit.source: Neurok Transmuter
trans-unit.target: 纽若克易质师

trans-unit.resname: DST·27 | Neurok Transmuter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {U}: Target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.\n{U}: Until end of turn, target artifact creature becomes blue and isn't an artifact.
trans-unit.target: {U}：直到回合结束，目标生物成为神器，且仍为原本的类别。 {U}：直到回合结束，目标神器生物成为蓝色且不是神器。

trans-unit.source: Psychic Overload
trans-unit.target: 心灵超载

trans-unit.resname: DST·28 | Psychic Overload | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, tap enchanted permanent.\nEnchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.\nEnchanted permanent has "Discard two artifact cards from your hand: Untap this permanent."
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，横置受此结界的永久物。 受此结界的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。 受此结界的永久物具有「从你手上弃掉两张神器牌：重置此永久物。」

trans-unit.resname: DST·29 | Pulse of the Grid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pulse of the Grid
trans-unit.target: 博识都的脉动

trans-unit.resname: DST·29 | Pulse of the Grid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard a card from your hand. Then if an opponent has more cards in hand than you, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后从你手上弃掉一张牌。 然后若任一对手的手牌比你多，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上.

trans-unit.resname: DST·29 | Pulse of the Grid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Before labs or lectures, there was insight.
trans-unit.target: 在实验或讲演现世之前，便有了洞察。

trans-unit.source: Quicksilver Behemoth
trans-unit.target: 水银贝西摩斯

trans-unit.resname: DST·30 | Quicksilver Behemoth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)\nWhen CARDNAME attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's in play.)
trans-unit.target: 神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用） 当CARDNAME进行攻击或阻挡，在战斗结束时将它移回其拥有者的手上。 （若它在场上，你才须将之移回）

trans-unit.source: Reshape
trans-unit.target: 重新塑型

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, sacrifice an artifact.\nSearch your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器，以作为使用CARDNAME的额外费用。 从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用为X或更少的神器牌并将其放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Today's paperweight, tomorrow's leveler."\n—Bruenna, Neurok leader
trans-unit.target: 「今日的小小纸镇，明日可能变成夷平者。」 ～纽若克统领布威娜

trans-unit.source: Retract
trans-unit.target: 回撤

trans-unit.source: Return all artifacts you control to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将所有由你操控的神器移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Secrets are meant to remain secret."\n—Memnarch
trans-unit.target: 「秘密本就该不为人知。」 ～蒙纳坷

trans-unit.source: Second Sight
trans-unit.target: 千里眼

trans-unit.resname: DST·33 | Second Sight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order; or look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.\nEntwine {U} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～检视目标对手牌库顶的五张牌，再将它们以任意顺序放回；或检视你牌库顶的五张牌，再将它们以任意顺序放回。 打包{U}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）

trans-unit.source: Synod Artificer
trans-unit.target: 悉诺议会神器师

trans-unit.resname: DST·34 | Synod Artificer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {X}, {T}: Tap X target noncreature artifacts.\n{X}, {T}: Untap X target noncreature artifacts.
trans-unit.target: {X}，{T}：横置X个目标非生物的神器。 {X}，{T}：重置X个目标非生物的神器。

trans-unit.source: Memnarch shared a touch of his power with the vedalken in return for their service. It is a debt he intends to collect.
trans-unit.target: 蒙纳坷将一小部份的力量分享给维多肯族，让该族藉由分劳来回报。 他总有一天会把这笔帐算个清楚。

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Engineer
trans-unit.target: 维多肯工程师

trans-unit.resname: DST·35 | Vedalken Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to play artifact spells or activated abilities of artifacts.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加两点任意颜色的单色法术力到你的法术力池中。 此法术力只能用来支付神器咒语的费用，或是神器之起动式异能的费用。

trans-unit.source: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.
trans-unit.target: 维多肯族不懂艺术～对他们来说，万物均各有创造目的。

trans-unit.source: Vex
trans-unit.target: 搅扰

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. That spell's controller may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 该咒语的操控者可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The druids would be better off if they spent more time in the lab and less time watching trees grow."\n—Pontifex, elder researcher
trans-unit.target: 「要是德鲁伊肯多待实验室，少盯着树猛瞧，他们会进步更快。」 ～大学者庞棣飞

trans-unit.source: Aether Snap
trans-unit.target: 乙太骤变

trans-unit.resname: DST·37 | Aether Snap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove all counters from all permanents and remove all tokens from the game.
trans-unit.target: 将所有永久物上的所有指示物，以及所有衍生物移出对战。

trans-unit.source: "May you wake to find you were only ever a dream."\n—Mephidross curse
trans-unit.target: 「你醒来后，会发现自己不过是一场梦。」 ～蔓非沼诅咒

trans-unit.resname: DST·38 | Burden of Greed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burden of Greed
trans-unit.target: 贪欲拖累

trans-unit.resname: DST·38 | Burden of Greed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 1 life for each tapped artifact he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手每操控一个已横置的神器，便失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: DST·38 | Burden of Greed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The one who dies with the most toys is still dead."\n—Geth, keeper of the Vault
trans-unit.target: 「有一堆玩具陪葬的死人，一样是个死人。」 ～黯窖领主盖司

trans-unit.source: Chittering Rats
trans-unit.target: 吱叫老鼠

trans-unit.resname: DST·39 | Chittering Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, target opponent puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，目标对手将一张手牌置于其牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Bottom feeders sometimes rise to the top.
trans-unit.target: 坏笋也有冒出头的时候。

trans-unit.source: Death Cloud
trans-unit.target: 致命云群

trans-unit.resname: DST·40 | Death Cloud | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player loses X life, then discards X cards from his or her hand, then sacrifices X creatures, then sacrifices X lands.

trans-unit.source: When Mirrodin's varied civilizations developed ways to fight the levelers, Memnarch upped the stakes.

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, put an attacking Twin artifact creature token into play. Its power is equal to CARDNAME's power and its toughness is equal to CARDNAME's toughness. Sacrifice the token at end of combat.

trans-unit.source: "As the experimental population grows, so do the number of myr. It's a perfect equilibrium."\n—Memnarch
trans-unit.target: 「当实验族群的数量增加时，秘耳的数量也会增加。 真是个完美的平衡。」 ～蒙纳坷

trans-unit.source: Trinisphere
trans-unit.target: 三定法球

trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to play costs three mana to play. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to play costs {2}{B} to play instead.)
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME并未横置，每个使用时之费用小于三的咒语都须支付三点法术力才能使用。 （需额外支付的费用可以任意颜色的法术力或无色法术力来支付。 举例来说，要支付{1}{B}来使用的咒语，则改为要支付{2}{B}来使用。)

trans-unit.source: Ur-Golem's Eye
trans-unit.target: 铀魔像之眼

trans-unit.resname: DST·155 | Ur-Golem's Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{2}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: It still stares accusingly at Memnarch, though millennia have passed since he separated the eye from its body.
trans-unit.target: 虽然千年前便已遭蒙纳坷自本体卸下，这眼睛至今依旧瞪视着他。

trans-unit.source: Voltaic Construct
trans-unit.target: 电流组构体

trans-unit.resname: DST·156 | Voltaic Construct | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}: Untap target artifact creature.
trans-unit.target: {2}：重置目标神器生物。

trans-unit.source: The undead may outlast the living, but those who have never lived outlast them both.
trans-unit.target: 不死族也许能比活物存在得更久，但从未有生命者可比这两者都存在得更久。

trans-unit.source: Vulshok Morningstar
trans-unit.target: 瓦许克晨星锤

trans-unit.resname: DST·157 | Vulshok Morningstar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card comes into play unattached and stays in play if the creature leaves play.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2。 佩带{2}({2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。 此牌进场时并未装备，且该生物离场后，此牌依旧在场。）

trans-unit.resname: DST·158 | Wand of the Elements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wand of the Elements
trans-unit.target: 元素魔杖

trans-unit.resname: DST·158 | Wand of the Elements | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice an Island: Put a 2/2 blue Elemental creature token with flying into play.\n{T}, Sacrifice a Mountain: Put a 3/3 red Elemental creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲一个海岛：将一个2/2蓝色，具有飞行异能的元素衍生物放置进场。 {T}，牺牲一个山脉：将一个3/3红色的元素衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: DST·158 | Wand of the Elements | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It gives legs to the earth and wings to the sky.
trans-unit.target: 它让大地有足能行，让天空有翼飞翔。

trans-unit.resname: DST·159 | Well of Lost Dreams | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Well of Lost Dreams
trans-unit.target: 迷梦深井

trans-unit.resname: DST·159 | Well of Lost Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，你可以支付{X}，X须小于或等于你所获得的生命数量。 若你如此作，则抓X张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DST·159 | Well of Lost Dreams | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some say the knowledge lost during the Ritual of Rebuking is returned through the well's waters.
trans-unit.target: 传说在训诫仪式之中消失的知识，都会藉由井水涌回。

trans-unit.source: Whispersilk Cloak
trans-unit.target: 细语丝篷

trans-unit.resname: DST·160 | Whispersilk Cloak | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature is unblockable and can't be the target of spells or abilities.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card comes into play unattached and stays in play if the creature leaves play.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物不能被阻挡，且不能成为咒语或异能的目标。 佩带{2}({2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。 此牌进场时并未装备，且该生物离场后，此牌依旧在场。）

trans-unit.source: Wirefly Hive
trans-unit.target: 星火虫巢窝

trans-unit.resname: DST·161 | Wirefly Hive | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a 2/2 Wirefly artifact creature token with flying into play. If you lose the flip, destroy all Wireflies.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：掷一枚硬币。 若你赢得此掷，则将一个2/2，具有飞行异能的星火虫神器生物衍生物放置进场。 若你输去此掷，则消灭所有星火虫。

trans-unit.source: "The lifespan of a wirefly can be precisely described as 'short.'"\n—Bruenna, Neurok leader
trans-unit.target: 「星火虫的生命史有一妙喻：『短』。」 ～纽若克统领布威娜

trans-unit.source: Wurm's Tooth
trans-unit.target: 亚龙巨牙

trans-unit.resname: DST·162 | Wurm's Tooth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手使用任何绿色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.
trans-unit.target: 亚龙不会说谎。 它若张开嘴巴，就是要把你吃掉。

trans-unit.source: Blinkmoth Nexus
trans-unit.target: 光蛾连结点

trans-unit.resname: DST·163 | Blinkmoth Nexus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}: CARDNAME becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.\n{1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}：CARDNAME成为1/1，具有飞行异能的光蛾神器生物直到回合结束。 它仍然是地。 {1}，{T}：目标光蛾得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Darksteel Citadel
trans-unit.target: 玄铁殿堂

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is indestructible. ("Destroy" effects and lethal damage don't destroy it.)\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不会毁坏。 （注明「消灭」的效应以及致命伤害都不会将它消灭。） {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Panopticon, forge of the Darksteel Eye, home of Mirrodin's keeper.
trans-unit.target: 万象殿，玄铁眼之锻炉，秘罗地守卫的居处。

trans-unit.target: 秘罗地核心

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。
